Thank you for your hard work!\""},{"lineNumber":49282,"originalJapaneseLine":"「光がないから寝過ごしたわ。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"There was no light, so I overslept."},{"lineNumber":49283,"originalJapaneseLine":"　光蝕か。珍妙なものだな」","translatedEnglishLine":"A light eclipse, huh? What a curious thing.\""},{"lineNumber":49284,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ははっ。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Haha."},{"lineNumber":49285,"originalJapaneseLine":"　なにやら不吉だと言い出す兵もいますが……」","translatedEnglishLine":"There are soldiers who say it’s ominous, but...\""},{"lineNumber":49286,"originalJapaneseLine":"「んーー？　今日も実にニィハオではないか。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hmm? Today is really 'Ni Hao,' isn't it."},{"lineNumber":49287,"originalJapaneseLine":"　さあ、侵攻だ」","translatedEnglishLine":"Now, let's advance.\""},{"lineNumber":49288,"originalJapaneseLine":"「は…………ご機嫌、ですね……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Uh... you seem to be in a good mood...\""},{"lineNumber":49289,"originalJapaneseLine":"「なんだね？　ニィハオでない事柄でもあるのかね。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"What is it? Is there something that's not 'Ni Hao'?"},{"lineNumber":49290,"originalJapaneseLine":"　光蝕など、珍しくもない。他に何か？」","translatedEnglishLine":"A light eclipse is nothing unusual. Anything else?\""},{"lineNumber":49291,"originalJapaneseLine":"「う、ええと……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Uh, well..."},{"lineNumber":49292,"originalJapaneseLine":"今ひとつ、言葉の意味が分からないまま、","translatedEnglishLine":"Still not fully understanding the words,"},{"lineNumber":49293,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔物兵は再度促されて口を開いた。","translatedEnglishLine":"the demon soldier was prompted again and began to speak."},{"lineNumber":49294,"originalJapaneseLine":"「前線の兵たちの間に、不安が広がっています。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"There is growing unease among the front-line soldiers."},{"lineNumber":49295,"originalJapaneseLine":"　その、首都はムレレ将軍と共に取られて……」","translatedEnglishLine":"The capital has been taken along with General Murele...\""},{"lineNumber":49296,"originalJapaneseLine":"「首都？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"The capital?\""},{"lineNumber":49297,"originalJapaneseLine":"道ばたにムシの死骸を見つけたとでも","translatedEnglishLine":"As if someone reported the discovery of an insect carcass by the roadside,"},{"lineNumber":49298,"originalJapaneseLine":"報告されたような声で、大将軍は聞き返した。","translatedEnglishLine":"the great general asked back in a questioning tone."},{"lineNumber":49299,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そんなものは問題ではない。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"That kind of thing is not the problem."},{"lineNumber":49300,"originalJapaneseLine":"　数が違うのだ。周りからじっくり、","translatedEnglishLine":"The numbers are what's different. We will slowly grind them down from around them,"},{"lineNumber":49301,"originalJapaneseLine":"　挽き潰していけばいい」","translatedEnglishLine":"and crush them.\""},{"lineNumber":49302,"originalJapaneseLine":"「それは……はい、そうですが……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"That is... yes, that's true, but..."},{"lineNumber":49303,"originalJapaneseLine":"　人間の、中にも……その、強い者がいるとか……","translatedEnglishLine":"Among the humans... well, there are strong ones..."},{"lineNumber":49304,"originalJapaneseLine":"　魔人様も、倒されてしまって……」","translatedEnglishLine":"Even the demon lord has been defeated...\""},{"lineNumber":49305,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ふっ、ふふ、ふふふふふ。魔人か。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Huh, hehe, fufufufufu. A demon lord, huh."},{"lineNumber":49306,"originalJapaneseLine":"　そうだなぁ、倒されたな。はーーーーははは！","translatedEnglishLine":"Yes, he was defeated. Haaa—hahaha!"},{"lineNumber":49307,"originalJapaneseLine":"　実にニィハオだよ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Truly 'Ni Hao'!\""},{"lineNumber":49308,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ひっ！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Eek!?\""},{"lineNumber":49309,"originalJapaneseLine":"唐突に、ツォトンは巨体を振るわせて","translatedEnglishLine":"Suddenly, Tsoton shook his massive body"},{"lineNumber":49310,"originalJapaneseLine":"笑い声を上げた。","translatedEnglishLine":"and burst out laughing."},{"lineNumber":49311,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ただただ食事を求める愚か者！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Fools who only seek food!"},{"lineNumber":49312,"originalJapaneseLine":"　悪趣味に興じるだけの怠け者！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Lazy ones who indulge only in bad tastes!"},{"lineNumber":49313,"originalJapaneseLine":"「なんでこの私が、そんなニィハオじゃない連中の","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Why was I, of all people, put at a disadvantage by those who aren't even 'Ni Hao'?"},{"lineNumber":49314,"originalJapaneseLine":"　下風に立たされていたのか！","translatedEnglishLine":"Why was I put on the losing side!"},{"lineNumber":49315,"originalJapaneseLine":"　やっといなくなってくれた！」","translatedEnglishLine":"They’re finally gone!"},{"lineNumber":49316,"originalJapaneseLine":"「は、はぁ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"H-haa...\""},{"lineNumber":49317,"originalJapaneseLine":"「これからは私の思い通りにするぞ。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"From now on, everything will go my way."},{"lineNumber":49318,"originalJapaneseLine":"　邪魔な人間を殺し、","translatedEnglishLine":"I will kill obstructive humans,"},{"lineNumber":49319,"originalJapaneseLine":"　より良い魔物の世界を体現するのだ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"and embody a better world of demons!\""},{"lineNumber":49320,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あ、ケイブリス様の……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah, Lord Cavebris’s..."},{"lineNumber":49321,"originalJapaneseLine":"　えぇと確か、人間は8割殺し、2割生かすとか……","translatedEnglishLine":"Uh, if I remember correctly, kill 80% of humans, keep 20% alive..."},{"lineNumber":49322,"originalJapaneseLine":"「その通り！　それがケイブリス様の意志！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Exactly! That is Lord Cavebris’s will!"},{"lineNumber":49323,"originalJapaneseLine":"　……だが、それは減らしすぎだ。","translatedEnglishLine":"...But that reduces their numbers too much."},{"lineNumber":49324,"originalJapaneseLine":"　我々の奴隷として、玩具としては数が足りない」","translatedEnglishLine":"They’re not enough as our slaves and toys.\""},{"lineNumber":49325,"originalJapaneseLine":"「しかし、反乱を封じるという意図なのでは……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"But isn’t the intention to suppress rebellion...?"},{"lineNumber":49326,"originalJapaneseLine":"「はははは！　そこ！　まさしくそこだ！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hahaha! Right there! Exactly there!"},{"lineNumber":49327,"originalJapaneseLine":"　管理さえ行き届く体制であれば、","translatedEnglishLine":"If there is a system of thorough management,"},{"lineNumber":49328,"originalJapaneseLine":"　少々数が多くても何の問題もない！」","translatedEnglishLine":"then even a somewhat larger number poses no problem!\""},{"lineNumber":49329,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そう……なのでしょうか」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I see... is that so?\""},{"lineNumber":49330,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そうだとも！　人間の数を減らすのは最低限に、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"That’s right! Reduce the number of humans to the minimum,"}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「がはははは、大丈夫だ大丈夫。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Gahahahaha, it's fine, it's fine.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: この暗闇なら見つかりっこない。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: In this darkness, there's no way we'll be found.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今のうちに大将軍を仕留めるぞ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Now's the time to take down the general."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「それですが……出発時にもお話ししましたが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "However... as I mentioned when we departed,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 必ずツォトンがここにいるとは……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'm not certain that Tsoton is definitely here...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いーや、大丈夫。必ずいる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "No, it's fine. He's definitely here.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺様が選んだのだ、間違いない。さあいくぞ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I chose this spot myself, no mistake. Now, let's go."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔軍第5軍　司令部――
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Demon Army 5th Division - Headquarters――

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「むっふふふふ。ご苦労！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Mufufufufu. Good work!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔物大将軍ツォトンが司令部に姿を見せた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The great demon general Tsoton appeared at the headquarters.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「はっ、ツォトン大将軍！　お疲れ様です！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Sir, Great General Tsoton! Thank you for your hard work!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「光がないから寝過ごしたわ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "There was no light, so I overslept.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 光蝕か。珍妙なものだな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A light eclipse, huh? What a curious thing."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ははっ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Haha.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なにやら不吉だと言い出す兵もいますが……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There are soldiers who say it’s ominous, but..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「んーー？　今日も実にニィハオではないか。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hmm? Today is really 'Ni Hao,' isn't it.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: さあ、侵攻だ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Now, let's advance."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「は…………ご機嫌、ですね……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Uh... you seem to be in a good mood..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「なんだね？　ニィハオでない事柄でもあるのかね。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "What is it? Is there something that's not 'Ni Hao'?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 光蝕など、珍しくもない。他に何か？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A light eclipse is nothing unusual. Anything else?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「う、ええと……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Uh, well...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今ひとつ、言葉の意味が分からないまま、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Still not fully understanding the words,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔物兵は再度促されて口を開いた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the demon soldier was prompted again and began to speak.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「前線の兵たちの間に、不安が広がっています。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "There is growing unease among the front-line soldiers.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その、首都はムレレ将軍と共に取られて……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The capital has been taken along with General Murele..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「首都？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "The capital?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 道ばたにムシの死骸を見つけたとでも
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: As if someone reported the discovery of an insect carcass by the roadside,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 報告されたような声で、大将軍は聞き返した。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the great general asked back in a questioning tone.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そんなものは問題ではない。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "That kind of thing is not the problem.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 数が違うのだ。周りからじっくり、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The numbers are what's different. We will slowly grind them down from around them,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 挽き潰していけばいい」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and crush them."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「それは……はい、そうですが……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "That is... yes, that's true, but...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 人間の、中にも……その、強い者がいるとか……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Among the humans... well, there are strong ones...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人様も、倒されてしまって……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Even the demon lord has been defeated..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふっ、ふふ、ふふふふふ。魔人か。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Huh, hehe, fufufufufu. A demon lord, huh.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そうだなぁ、倒されたな。はーーーーははは！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Yes, he was defeated. Haaa—hahaha!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 実にニィハオだよ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Truly 'Ni Hao'!"
"Eek!?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 唐突に、ツォトンは巨体を振るわせて
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Suddenly, Tsoton shook his massive body

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 笑い声を上げた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and burst out laughing.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ただただ食事を求める愚か者！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Fools who only seek food!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 悪趣味に興じるだけの怠け者！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lazy ones who indulge only in bad tastes!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「なんでこの私が、そんなニィハオじゃない連中の
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Why was I, of all people, put at a disadvantage by those who aren't even 'Ni Hao'?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 下風に立たされていたのか！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Why was I put on the losing side!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: やっといなくなってくれた！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They’re finally gone!
"H-haa..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「これからは私の思い通りにするぞ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "From now on, everything will go my way.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 邪魔な人間を殺し、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I will kill obstructive humans,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: より良い魔物の世界を体現するのだ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and embody a better world of demons!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あ、ケイブリス様の……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ah, Lord Cavebris’s...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: えぇと確か、人間は8割殺し、2割生かすとか……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Uh, if I remember correctly, kill 80% of humans, keep 20% alive...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「その通り！　それがケイブリス様の意志！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Exactly! That is Lord Cavebris’s will!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ……だが、それは減らしすぎだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ...But that reduces their numbers too much.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 我々の奴隷として、玩具としては数が足りない」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They’re not enough as our slaves and toys."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「しかし、反乱を封じるという意図なのでは……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "But isn’t the intention to suppress rebellion...?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「はははは！　そこ！　まさしくそこだ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hahaha! Right there! Exactly there!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 管理さえ行き届く体制であれば、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If there is a system of thorough management,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 少々数が多くても何の問題もない！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: then even a somewhat larger number poses no problem!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そう……なのでしょうか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I see... is that so?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そうだとも！　人間の数を減らすのは最低限に、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "That’s right! Reduce the number of humans to the minimum,

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

Exactly there!"},{"lineNumber":49327,"originalJapaneseLine":"　管理さえ行き届く体制であれば、","translatedEnglishLine":"If there is a system of thorough management,"},{"lineNumber":49328,"originalJapaneseLine":"　少々数が多くても何の問題もない！」","translatedEnglishLine":"then even a somewhat larger number poses no problem!\""},{"lineNumber":49329,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そう……なのでしょうか」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I see... is that so?\""},{"lineNumber":49330,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そうだとも！　人間の数を減らすのは最低限に、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"That’s right! Reduce the number of humans to the minimum,"}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「がはははは、大丈夫だ大丈夫。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Gahahahaha, it's fine, it's fine.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: この暗闇なら見つかりっこない。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: In this darkness, there's no way we'll be found.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今のうちに大将軍を仕留めるぞ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Now's the time to take down the general."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「それですが……出発時にもお話ししましたが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "However... as I mentioned when we departed,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 必ずツォトンがここにいるとは……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'm not certain that Tsoton is definitely here...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いーや、大丈夫。必ずいる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "No, it's fine. He's definitely here.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺様が選んだのだ、間違いない。さあいくぞ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I chose this spot myself, no mistake. Now, let's go."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔軍第5軍　司令部――
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Demon Army 5th Division - Headquarters――

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「むっふふふふ。ご苦労！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Mufufufufu. Good work!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔物大将軍ツォトンが司令部に姿を見せた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The great demon general Tsoton appeared at the headquarters.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「はっ、ツォトン大将軍！　お疲れ様です！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Sir, Great General Tsoton! Thank you for your hard work!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「光がないから寝過ごしたわ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "There was no light, so I overslept.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 光蝕か。珍妙なものだな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A light eclipse, huh? What a curious thing."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ははっ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Haha.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なにやら不吉だと言い出す兵もいますが……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There are soldiers who say it’s ominous, but..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「んーー？　今日も実にニィハオではないか。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hmm? Today is really 'Ni Hao,' isn't it.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: さあ、侵攻だ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Now, let's advance."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「は…………ご機嫌、ですね……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Uh... you seem to be in a good mood..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「なんだね？　ニィハオでない事柄でもあるのかね。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "What is it? Is there something that's not 'Ni Hao'?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 光蝕など、珍しくもない。他に何か？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A light eclipse is nothing unusual. Anything else?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「う、ええと……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Uh, well...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今ひとつ、言葉の意味が分からないまま、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Still not fully understanding the words,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔物兵は再度促されて口を開いた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the demon soldier was prompted again and began to speak.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「前線の兵たちの間に、不安が広がっています。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "There is growing unease among the front-line soldiers.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その、首都はムレレ将軍と共に取られて……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The capital has been taken along with General Murele..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「首都？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "The capital?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 道ばたにムシの死骸を見つけたとでも
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: As if someone reported the discovery of an insect carcass by the roadside,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 報告されたような声で、大将軍は聞き返した。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the great general asked back in a questioning tone.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そんなものは問題ではない。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "That kind of thing is not the problem.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 数が違うのだ。周りからじっくり、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The numbers are what's different. We will slowly grind them down from around them,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 挽き潰していけばいい」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and crush them."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「それは……はい、そうですが……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "That is... yes, that's true, but...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 人間の、中にも……その、強い者がいるとか……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Among the humans... well, there are strong ones...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人様も、倒されてしまって……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Even the demon lord has been defeated..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふっ、ふふ、ふふふふふ。魔人か。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Huh, hehe, fufufufufu. A demon lord, huh.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そうだなぁ、倒されたな。はーーーーははは！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Yes, he was defeated. Haaa—hahaha!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 実にニィハオだよ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Truly 'Ni Hao'!"
"Eek!?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 唐突に、ツォトンは巨体を振るわせて
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Suddenly, Tsoton shook his massive body

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 笑い声を上げた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and burst out laughing.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ただただ食事を求める愚か者！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Fools who only seek food!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 悪趣味に興じるだけの怠け者！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lazy ones who indulge only in bad tastes!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「なんでこの私が、そんなニィハオじゃない連中の
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Why was I, of all people, put at a disadvantage by those who aren't even 'Ni Hao'?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 下風に立たされていたのか！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Why was I put on the losing side!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: やっといなくなってくれた！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They’re finally gone!
"H-haa..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「これからは私の思い通りにするぞ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "From now on, everything will go my way.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 邪魔な人間を殺し、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I will kill obstructive humans,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: より良い魔物の世界を体現するのだ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and embody a better world of demons!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あ、ケイブリス様の……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ah, Lord Cavebris’s...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: えぇと確か、人間は8割殺し、2割生かすとか……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Uh, if I remember correctly, kill 80% of humans, keep 20% alive...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「その通り！　それがケイブリス様の意志！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Exactly! That is Lord Cavebris’s will!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ……だが、それは減らしすぎだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ...But that reduces their numbers too much.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 我々の奴隷として、玩具としては数が足りない」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They’re not enough as our slaves and toys."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「しかし、反乱を封じるという意図なのでは……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "But isn’t the intention to suppress rebellion...?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「はははは！　そこ！　まさしくそこだ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hahaha! Right there! Exactly there!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 管理さえ行き届く体制であれば、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If there is a system of thorough management,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 少々数が多くても何の問題もない！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: then even a somewhat larger number poses no problem!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そう……なのでしょうか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I see... is that so?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そうだとも！　人間の数を減らすのは最低限に、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "That’s right! Reduce the number of humans to the minimum,
